rows.label: tev045901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Hala what the Prone are really like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Hala if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Hala about recent developments.

rows.label: tev045901_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Hala about the Ganglion.

rows.label: tev045901_SEL1051
rows.name: Ask Hala about Lao's betrayal.

rows.label: tev045901_SEL1071
rows.name: Ask Hala what she will do next.

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0001
rows.name: Until now you only knew Cavern Clan Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0002
rows.name: You must think all Prone cowardly and violent![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0003
rows.name:
But Tree Clan are peaceful and friendly.
We never fight unless fight comes to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0004
rows.name:
Tree Clan like to dance and drink!
Whenever we catch mighty beast,
we have great festival until dawn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0005
rows.name:
I loathe Ganglion as much as you, Earth alien.
But I wish war was over. Then I could smile again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0008
rows.name:
Thea has not been same since her fianc√© died.
I have never seen her so sad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0009
rows.name: I do what I can for her. But it is not enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0010
rows.name: Do BLADEs help other races with such private matters?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0011
rows.name: When this calms down, I should find BLADE to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0012
rows.name: Thea deserves happiness. She deserves to dance again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0013
rows.name:
I also used to dance. Me and Thea's mother were
meant to be finest dancers in all Tree Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0014
rows.name:
But war put end to that. Cavern Clan injured my leg.
I had to give up dream.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0015
rows.name:
Maybe that is why I watch Thea dance.
It's like I dance with her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0016
rows.name:
Her happiness brings me happiness.
I cannot thank you enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0017
rows.name:
...Mmm? Thea? She went to dance at diner in
industrial district. You should see it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG0018
rows.name: You will be captivated. You may not leave diner again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1001
rows.name:
Prone have long history of fighting.
Our current war has lasted 10,000 suns.
But we are peaceful compared to Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1002
rows.name: Those dogs war as easily as they breathe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1003
rows.name:
Earth aliens think they know how ugly war can get.
But you are wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1004
rows.name:
Ganglion will shock you with dirty tricks.
Always be ready![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1009
rows.name:
We hear Ganglion tried to steal data by corrupting
one of your BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1010
rows.name:
That is Ganglion's way. They also tricked Cavern Clan.
Helped them do dirty work of capturing Tree Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1011
rows.name: They are mongrels. Or worse. You must stop them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1016
rows.name:
Ganglion's chief of lies is no more.
Remaining Cavern Clan have scattered to four winds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1017
rows.name:
For the first time in 10,000 suns,
Tree Clan can know peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1018
rows.name:
I like this thought. No more watching friends die.
No more killing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1019
rows.name:
Prone can wake up in morning deciding how to live.
Not how to die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045901_MSG1020
rows.name:
We can gather around fire and dance. Enjoy peace.
Celebrate life![ST:wait ]
